full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
**Technical Brief: Automatic Process Generation using VGSC & Workflow**

---

**Call identifier:** PW-22-01011658
**Publication Date:** October 27, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2022 2:00 PM EST
**amendmentDate:** November 29, 2022

**Procurement Overview**

The Government of Canada is seeking a technical partner to provide services related to Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Power Platform solutions. This project involves business transformation of existing case management solutions, the implementation of new Dynamics and Power Platform solutions, departmental onboarding to new Dynamics-based and Power Platform solutions, and integration of new Dynamics and Power Platform systems with existing departmental systems. The work also entails modernization and evolution of existing Dynamics and Power Platform solutions, advancement of, and support for, the adoption of common solutions.

**Eligibility and Contract Type**
Only Tier 1 TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders are eligible to participate in this project. This contract will be awarded through a competitive bid process.

**Procurement Details**
* **Category:** SRV
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement, and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement.

**Submission Requirements**

* All building and architect capacity resource categories must be submitted for all services
* Proposal Contact: Karine Chretien, Indigenous Services Canada, Chretien.karine@canada.ca, 873-354-6817
* Bidders must support Microsoft Dynamics CRM and Power Platform solutions

**Requirements**

* Security Requirement: Common PS SRCL #06 applies
* Minimum Corporate Security Required: Designated Organization Screening (DOS)
* Minimum Resource Security Required: Enhanced Reliability
